nodes.text: Jonash Solo was a Human male who was the firstborn son of Den Solo and Tira Gama Solo, the twin brother of Tiion Sal-Solo, and the father of Han Solo.

When he was an infant, he and his father were kidnapped by pirates during a raid on Tralus. He escaped and married a woman named Jaina. The two later had a son who he named Han Solo. Jonash Solo and Jaina disappeared early in their son's life, rendering Han an orphan by the age of seven.
